Detailed Description

A scene graph node that represents different kinds of light sources.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: Light should be rendered only at first rendering pass(pass=1). In other cases, do nothing.

Member Data Documentation

const int AMBIENT = 128 [static]

A paramter to setMode, specifying an amibent light source.

const int DIRECTIONAL = 129 [static]

A paramter to setMode, specifying an directional light source.

const int OMNI = 130 [static]

A paramter to setMode, specifying an omnidirectional light source.

const int SPOT = 131 [static]

A paramter to setMode, specifying an spot light source.
